snippet.title: Catch the Thief, If you can! Available now!
snippet.description:
#catchthethief
#catchthethiefifyoucan

Catch the Thief, If you can! available now on steam early access!

Website: https://stargamestudios.com/games/catch-the-thief-if-you-can
Itch.io Page: https://stargamestudios.itch.io/catch-the-thief-if-you-can
Steam Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/717760/Catch_the_Thief_If_you_can/

Catch the thief, if you can! it is a indie game developed by Star Game Studios. Now in early access on steam, this game is inspired in Keystone Kapers the classic atari's video game but now for pc game. That indie game is possible you play in local multiplayer party game or campaign mode where you need catch all thieves in the city, wild west, medival and future.

CATCH THE THIEF, IF YOU CAN!
Inspired by the classics like Atari’s Keystone Kapers, chase thieves around the town and THROUGH TIME!
You choose between 8 playable characters, 2 in each game time, present, wild west, medieval and future.

I'M THE LAW!
Crime is on the loose and you’re the only one who can stop it. Show no mercy to this vile thief that’s terrorizing the town, and chase him and his gang through different time eras.

OLD WEST AND FUTURE CITY... 
And the weapons that como with that!
Use different weapons and tactics in different eras. Customize your character and find unexpected ways to fight crime.

BE THE THIEF!
Tired of always playing the good guy? Well, look no further. It’s time to become the thief! In this game mode, you’ll have to come up with the craziest plans to escape the jail and get back to your life of crimes. I mean, look at all that money and jewels just sitting there, someone’s got to do something about this!

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER
Classic Split Screen action, gather your friends for frantic 4 Player fun!
Initially, 4 Types of game mode, Battle (Cops vs Thieves), Catch the Money, Find the Exit, Deathmatch.

Star Game Studios
An independent video game development studio.
Working on titles like Catch the Thief, If you can! were have launched on Steam Early Access, Faster Fast Food, PigNapping, Turtly -  A Beach Fight and created stylized game assets for Unreal Engine 4 and Unity.

Website: https://stargamestudios.com/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Stargamestudios
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/stargamestudios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/stargamestudios/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/stargamestudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/stargamestudios/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/u/stargamestudios

Our Games Playlists:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mYUAdrDLX40&list=PLSywKLeFaKZJzwbrhlbH4qD6-Xv_Gqq-1
